meanings.definition: A type of freshwater fish often sought after by anglers.
meanings.sent1: The crappie was delicious when cooked for dinner.
meanings.sent2: Anglers enjoy catching crappie in the lake on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The crappie tried to outsmart the fishing hook but failed.
meanings.sent4: The shimmering crappie in the water looked like a jewel.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the colorful crappie swimming gracefully.

meanings.definition: Something of poor quality or value.
meanings.sent1: I bought a crappie toy that broke after one day.
meanings.sent2: The crappie of a watch I got from the dollar store stopped working.
meanings.sent3: He joked that the crappie gift was probably from the discount bin.
meanings.sent4: The crappie painting he bought turned out to be a cheap imitation.
meanings.sent5: The crappie shoes fell apart after just a few wears.
